briefdescription.para: An ordered output stream structure with unordered insert capabilities.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* vrna_stream_output_f) (void *auxdata, unsigned int i, void *data)
memberdef.name: vrna_stream_output_f

detaileddescription.para: This callback will be processed in sequential order as soon as sequential data in the output stream becomes available.

simplesect.para: The callback must also release the memory occupied by the data passed since the stream will lose any reference to it after the callback has been executed.

parameterdescription.para: A shared pointer for all calls, as provided by the second argument to vrna_ostream_init()
The index number of the data passed to data
A block of data ready for processing

memberdef.definition: typedef void() vrna_callback_stream_output(void *auxdata, unsigned int i, void *data)
memberdef.name: vrna_callback_stream_output

briefdescription.para: Create a dynamic char * stream data structure.

parameterdescription.para: The initial size of the buffer in characters
An optional output file stream handle that is used to write the collected data to (defaults to stdout if NULL)

briefdescription.para: Discard the current content of the dynamic char * stream data structure.

parameterdescription.para: The dynamic char * stream data structure to free

briefdescription.para: Free the memory occupied by a dynamic char * stream data structure.

detaileddescription.para: This function first flushes any remaining character data within the stream and then free's the memory occupied by the data structure.

parameterdescription.para: The dynamic char * stream data structure to free

briefdescription.para: Free the memory occupied by a dynamic char * stream and close the output stream.

detaileddescription.para: This function first flushes any remaining character data within the stream then closes the attached output file stream (if any), and finally free's the memory occupied by the data structure.

parameterdescription.para: The dynamic char * stream data structure to free

briefdescription.para: Flush the dynamic char * output stream.

detaileddescription.para: This function flushes the collected char * stream, either by writing to the attached file handle, or simply by writing to stdout if no file handle has been attached upon construction using vrna_cstr().

simplesect.para: The stream buffer is empty after execution of this function

parameterdescription.para: The dynamic char * stream data structure to flush

memberdef.argsstring: (struct vrna_cstr_s *buf, const char *structure, const char *format, va_list args)
memberdef.name: vrna_cstr_vprintf_structure

memberdef.argsstring: (struct vrna_cstr_s *buf, int i, int j, char si, char sj, int energy)
memberdef.name: vrna_cstr_print_eval_hp_loop

memberdef.argsstring: (struct vrna_cstr_s *buf, int i, int j, char si, char sj, int energy)
memberdef.name: vrna_cstr_print_eval_hp_loop_revert

memberdef.argsstring: (struct vrna_cstr_s *buf, int i, int j, char si, char sj, int k, int l, char sk, char sl, int energy)
memberdef.name: vrna_cstr_print_eval_int_loop

memberdef.argsstring: (struct vrna_cstr_s *buf, int i, int j, char si, char sj, int k, int l, char sk, char sl, int energy)
memberdef.name: vrna_cstr_print_eval_int_loop_revert

memberdef.argsstring: (struct vrna_cstr_s *buf, int i, int j, char si, char sj, int energy)
memberdef.name: vrna_cstr_print_eval_mb_loop

memberdef.argsstring: (struct vrna_cstr_s *buf, int i, int j, char si, char sj, int energy)
memberdef.name: vrna_cstr_print_eval_mb_loop_revert

memberdef.argsstring: (struct vrna_cstr_s *buf, int i, int L, int l[3], int energy)
memberdef.name: vrna_cstr_print_eval_gquad

briefdescription.para: Get an initialized ordered output stream.

parameterdescription.para: A callback function that processes and releases data in the stream
A pointer to auxiliary data passed as first argument to the output callback

briefdescription.para: Free an initialized ordered output stream.

parameterdescription.para: The output stream for which occupied memory should be free'd

briefdescription.para: Request index in ordered output stream.

detaileddescription.para: This function must be called prior to vrna_ostream_provide() to indicate that data associted with a certain index number is expected to be inserted into the stream in the future.

parameterdescription.para: The output stream for which the index is requested
The index to request data for

briefdescription.para: Provide output stream data for a particular index.

simplesect.para: The index data is provided for must have been requested using vrna_ostream_request() beforehand.

parameterdescription.para: The output stream for which data is provided
The index of the provided data
